testcase.classname: As a user of the application i want to search product and sort search results in Amazon
testcase.name: search functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user is successfully naviaged to "https://www.amazon.in/".............passed When user enters "mobile" in searchbox in amazon............................passed And user click on searchbox in homepage.....................................passed And user waits for page to load.............................................passed Then search results should display..........................................passed When user sorts products from high to low...................................passed Then search results count should change.....................................passed
